attributes.additional_details:
Drastic change, that will cost a fortune and so not something to do now, but to plan for in the next 10 years!

Turn Westminster into a museum.
Build a brand new, secure facility. Styled around a modern democratic system. Circular in nature, with mircrophones and voting at each position.

Why?.....
Get rid of this childish behaviour we see every day in parliament. Get people working together to run the country instead of throwing abuse at one another.
